    def test_cleansing_headers(self):
         '''Checking the cleansing headers process'''
         import pandas as pd
         test_data = {'hello world__all ':['A', 'B', 'C', 'D']}
         tdf = pd.DataFrame(test_data)
         rtdf = _cleanse_headers(tdf)
         self.assertEqual(rtdf.columns, pd.Index(['hello_world_all'], dtype='object'))
 
    def test_change_types(self):
        '''Checking the cleansing headers process'''
        import pandas as pu
        test2_data = {'my_table':['A',1,True,1.5,'my example']}
        udf = pu.DataFrame(test2_data)
        rudf = _change_types(udf)
        print(rudf.dtypes)
